item.title: KillZone 2 Steel-Book Edition is here
item.description: Note: Please DIGG this post by clicking here or Reddit this post by clicking here. I’ll be one of the proud owners of a very special steel book edition of Killzone 2 very soon. The cool part being that it’d be much before most of the rest of the world gets to even see these little babies because the official release date is still five days away. And the icing on the cake “A free classic Art Book”.
item.content:
Note: Please DIGG this post by clicking here or Reddit this post by clicking here.

I’ll be one of the proud owners of a very special steel book edition of Killzone 2 very soon. The cool part being that it’d be much before most of the rest of the world gets to even see these little babies because the official release date is still five days away. And the icing on the cake “A free classic Art Book”. Everything courtesy our dear old Sam from GamingIndians. Aren’t you all jealous of me? There there..In the meanwhile, you can feast your eyes on a few screenshots of the bundles of joy waiting to be shipped out. KILLZOWNED!!
